alert.note: Alert for Eastern Franklin; Eastern Hampden; Eastern Hampshire; Northern Worcester; Western Franklin; Western Hampden; Western Hampshire (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 03 at 2:11AM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...BRIEF PERIOD OF MODERATE SNOW TO REDUCE VISIBILITY INTO WESTERN MASSACHUSETTS... At 208 AM EST, an area of brief moderate intensity snow was located along a line extending from near Stratton to near Otis. Movement was east at 55 mph. Visibilities as low as one half mile, gusts up to 40 mph and up to a half inch of new snow can be expected as this snow band moves east-southeast. Locations impacted include... Springfield, Chicopee, Westfield, Holyoke, Amherst, Northampton, West Springfield, Greenfield, Orange, Deerfield, Ludlow, South Hadley, Easthampton, Belchertown, Wilbraham, Palmer, Monroe, Athol, Ware and Monson. Be prepared for difficult driving conditions. Consider delaying travel if you will be going through this area of snow. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.
